overview: This film tells a city that has been surrounded by zombies. In the city there is still a man who still lives with his baby child. His father used a remote control car to get milk and food at a convenience store. They live in an apartment. In the apartment there are a lot of zombies that make him unable to go out to look for food in the apartment.

production_companies.name: Zhejiang Dongyang Dayou Culture Communication Co., Ltd.
Beijing Xinying Field Culture Media Co., Ltd.

title: The Way Home 2
